list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
feat: Loading component is added, Enter keypress handling added
Loading component now displays loading indicator while data is fetched. Search component pushes searchphrase to the history.

task.summary:
feat: added basics in search component, added routing
Basics of Search.js component are done, input value is passed to the AirQuality.js component via url params and the result for location is displayed.

feat: Added ResultsPage.js and Weather.js components
ResultsPage.js will collect data from search and pass it to all the subcomponents. Weather component is now added with basic logic and data fetching. It fetches city key from AccuWeather API and then fetches weather for this city using the key. All fetches use herokus cors-anywhere now to fix cors errors.

feat: basic content and styling for Weather.js
Weather.js component now has basic style and content, it uses react-icons for weather icons. Helper function weatherIconChecker.js is created, it checks for weatherIcon number in the response from AccuWeather API and returns appropriate icon from react-icons.

feat: changed API to openWeather
Both APIs are now switched for openWeather API due to more possible requests in the new one.

feat: Changed air quality API, added some styling for the whole app, displaying additional info
openWeather API for air quality was disaster, so I have switched back to the Aqicn API, but now it is fetching data using coordinates from openWeather weather data fetch response. Weather displays react icon now, temperature and feels like temperature. Air quality displays color coded AQI, pm10 and pm2.5. Some styling is added for whole app.

feat: Loading component is added, Enter keypress handling added
Loading component now displays loading indicator while data is fetched. Search component pushes search phrase to the history. User can only search with button click, enter click, and empty input can't be submitted.
